entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please hold for the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yeah, hi, I need to return something. I bought some shoes and tires last week, and they're not working out for me.
Okay, I can definitely help you with a return. Do you have your order number handy?
Great, I see the order here. I see the shoes and tires. Have you... have you used them at all?
Well, yeah, I tried them out. That's how I know I don't like them.
Okay, I need to ask, were the tires mounted on your bike, and were the shoes installed with cleats?
Yeah, I had the tires mounted, and I installed the cleats on the shoes. How else was I supposed to test them?
Unfortunately, sir, because the tires were mounted and the shoes had cleats installed, we cannot accept the return. Items must be in new, unused condition to be eligible for a return.
What? That's ridiculous! How can I know if I like them if I don't try them? There are just some cleat marks on the shoes!

I understand your frustration, but once tires have been mounted, even once, and especially if the tires have dirty tires from being used outdoors, they are considered used. The same goes for the shoes with cleat marks from being installed. We cannot resell them as new. It's company policy.
So, you're telling me I'm stuck with this stuff? This is terrible customer service! I just spent a lot of money with you guys!
I understand your frustration. Let me see if there is anything else I can offer. Perhaps a discount on a future purchase?
A discount? After this? I'm never buying from you again! This is unbelievable!
Sir, I am truly sorry that the return cannot be processed. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, there isn't! This is completely unacceptable!
I understand. Have a good day, sir.
